senses.sense_definition: Relating to <w>slurbs</w>, which are suburban areas characterized by poor planning, low-quality housing, or slum-like conditions.

examples.text: The rapid expansion of the city created a <w>slurban</w> landscape filled with cheap strip malls and identical houses.
Urban planners are trying to prevent <w>slurban</w> sprawl by enforcing stricter zoning regulations.
